Description: Fragment of papyrus with remains of 4 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto) and 5 lines against the fibres (verso). Mounted with EA75399, 75397, 75396.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380710) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380710)
